title: Walking Dead S:5 | E:11 The Distance | Slate TV Club
description:
Mike Vuolo and Chris Wade recap Episode 11 of The Walking Dead, "The Distance.” Mike is a senior producer and the host of Slate's Lexicon Valley podcast, and Chris is a Slate video producer.
 
 
Slate Plus members can download Slate’s Walking Dead podcast immediately following the broadcast of new episodes on AMC. To learn more, try Slate Plus free for two weeks at Slate.com/DeadPlus
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
